text: فقال ان هذا الا سحر يؤثر

translations.translation: And said: "This is nothing but the magic of old,
and said: “This (Qur'an) is merely a sorcery of yore;
said, "This (the Quran) is nothing but magic, inherited from ancient magicians.
And said, “This is nothing but magic learnt from earlier men.”
Then he said: "This is nothing but magic from that of old,
~Then he said: This is naught but enchantment, narrated (from others);
He said, 'This is naught but a trumped-up sorcery;
And said: This is naught else than magic from of old;
and said, "This is nothing but sorcery from the ancients.
Then he said: naught is this but magic from of old;
saying, ‘It is nothing but traditional sorcery.
Then said he: "This is nothing but magic, derived from of old;
Then he said: "This is nothing but magic from that of old;
and said: 'This is no more than traced sorcery;
And said, “This is nothing but magic from the past.
And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].
[74:24] and said, of what he [the Prophet] had brought: ‘This is nothing but handed-down sorcery, learnt from sorcerers;

(And said: This) which Muhammad (pbuh) says (is naught else than magic from of old) magic which he took from Musaylimah the liar in al-Yamamah and he is now relating it to us; it is also said that this means: what he says is taken from Jabr and Yasar;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلاَّ سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ } معناه يُؤثرُ عَن غَيرِهِ ويخبرُ بهِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: { فَقَالَ } بعد اللتيا والتي { إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلاَّ سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ } [المدثر: 24] أي: يُروى ويُتعلم
